SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers

Class MainGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.MainGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class MainGameController extends Object implements GUIController
The MainGameController class implements the GUIController interface and serves as the controller for the main game screen. It manages the game board, player information, item selection, disconnection events and all other graphical elements.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      initialization method

    • objectivesButtonAction

      public void objectivesButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      objectivesButtonAction handles the action event due to the press of the "Objectives" button. It reproduces the specific sound and opens a new window using the scene path.
      Parameters:
      event - , the action event generated by clicking the "Objectives" button

    • updateMessageBox

      public void updateMessageBox(String msg, boolean Exception)
      updateMessageBox manages the viewing of messages during the game. Messages appear written normally if they are information messages for the player, with a red box if they are error messages.
      Parameters:
      msg - messages during the game based on players' action
      Exception - , true if msg is a message of error

    • updateScoreLabel

      public void updateScoreLabel(int score)
      update the score label with the score of the player.
      Parameters:
      score - player's score

    • updateCurrentTurnLabel

      public void updateCurrentTurnLabel(String msg)
      update method passing String. It shows the names of the players who are playing. The name of the current player turns red, the others are black.
      Parameters:
      msg - name of the player

    • restorePlayerLabels

      public void restorePlayerLabels(List<String> players, String firstPlayer)
      Restores all the players' name indicator and highlights the current player in red
      Parameters:
      players - a list of players' nicknames
      firstPlayer - the first player's nickname

    • updateYourNameLabel

      public void updateYourNameLabel(String name)
      update method passing String. Makes the player's name visible.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player

    • itemClick

      public void itemClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      handles the action event when an item is clicked and the logic for adding or removing the clicked item from the selection, numbering the item from one to three according to the player's choice. Checks if the clicked item is playable or not. Play a specific sound to indicate item selection. When an item is selected, its border turns blue.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to be managed

    • confirmSelectionAction

      public void confirmSelectionAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      handles the action event when the confirm selection button is clicked. Checks the validity of the selected items. If the selection is not corrected shows an error message, otherwise the message consists of asking in which column of the library put the items.
      Parameters:
      event - te event to be managed

    • shelfColumnButtonAction

      public void shelfColumnButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      handles the action event when a shelf column button is clicked. Sets the selected column based on the button clicked, checks the selected column for validity and notifies the GUI. If the column is full shows en error message and plays a specific sound.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to be managed

    • playersShelfButtonAction

      public void playersShelfButtonAction()
      handles the action of the players' Shelf button. Plays a specific sound for the click and open a new window to display the players' shelf of the other players who are playing.
